name: 程式設計
goals: Make students familiar with the syntax of C language and develop the programming skills of C language.
Cultivate the ability to think logically in programming.
Develop the ability to use programming in related fields.
Develop abstract thinking and reasoning skills.
syllabus:
【Course contents：16+2 weeks】

Learn the C programming language and its fundamental programming concepts. Gain the knowledge to write simple C language applications and undertake future courses that assume some background in computer programming. The course covers the following topics.

Week 1:  Introduction to C and its advanced applications, basic input/output

Week 2:  decision statements, if, if/else, if/else if/else, switch

Week 3:  decision statements, if, if/else, if/else if/else, switch

Week 4:  loop statements, while, for, do/while

Week 5:  loop statements, while, for, do/while

Week 6:  Array

Week 7:  Array

Week 8: Midterm exam

Week 9:  Characters and strings

Week 9:  Function

Week 10: Function

Week 11:  pointer

Week 12:  pointer

Week 13:  C structure, union, Bit Manipulations and Enumeration

Week 14:  Basic data stucture

Week 15: Final exam

Week 17: Flexible Course (Special Report)

Week 18: Flexible Course (Special Report)
